title: Dim crystal

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Dim crystals are the original variation of the coloured crystals  that are found in the Chambers of Xeric crab puzzle room, players can change the colour of these crystals to any other colour they need to finish the room by hitting the crabs and alligning them with the magic orb that bounces inside the room. For more information about how to solve this puzzle see Chambers of Xeric/Strategies#Crab puzzle

content:
Dim crystal
Released5 January 2017 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNone
LocationChambers of Xeric Crab puzzle room
OptionsNone
ExamineA dim crystal that's blocking the way.
Advanced data
Object ID29756

The Dim crystals are the original variation of the coloured crystals that are found in the Chambers of Xeric crab puzzle room, players can change the colour of these crystals to any other colour they need to finish the room by hitting the crabs and alligning them with the magic orb that bounces inside the room. For more information about how to solve this puzzle see Chambers of Xeric/Strategies#Crab puzzle

Typical layout of a crab puzzle room where this coloured crystal is seen.

This crystal should not be confused with Slightly dark crystal which is another variant of this crystal.

The '''Dim crystals''' are the original variation of the coloured crystals  that are found in the [[Chambers of Xeric]] crab puzzle room, players can change the colour of these crystals to any other colour they need to finish the room by hitting the crabs and alligning them with the magic orb that bounces inside the room. For more information about how to solve this puzzle see [[Chambers of Xeric/Strategies#Crab puzzle]]
[[File:Chambers of Xeric - Crab puzzle.png|thumb|left|200px|Typical layout of a crab puzzle room where this coloured crystal is seen.]]
This crystal should not be confused with [[Slightly dark crystal]] which is another variant of this crystal.
